recommendations.name: Brooklyn Steel
recommendations.description: This is a super cool, standing-room-only venue with great sound!

recommendations.name: Caff√® Vita
recommendations.description: Hands down best coffee in Bushwick. Try the lavender latte or campfire latte!

recommendations.name: Evil Katsu
recommendations.description: OMG incredibly delicious katsu sandwich! Chicken Katsu is my fave but they're all good! The bread is like a pillow.

recommendations.name: Clockwork Bar
recommendations.description: Divey yet iconic punk bar! Great place to meet up with friends. You will not get in trouble for adding graffiti.

recommendations.name: Poster House
recommendations.description: Cheap museum (+ free admission on Fridays!) with rotating exhibits of stunning vintage and modern posters from around the world

recommendations.name: Madison Square Garden
recommendations.description: MSG is the 'World's Most Famous Arena' and for good reason. Besides being the home of the NY Knicks & Rangers, it is the premier venue to see world-class musicians perform. In fact, Phish has played here 81 times since 1994!
